Actions.Name: Abandon the message in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation abandons a message in a queue.

Actions.Name: Abandon the message in a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation abandons a message in a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Close a session in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation closes a session in a queue.

Actions.Name: Close a session in the topic
Actions.Description: The operation closes a session in the topic.

Actions.Name: Complete the message in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation completes a message in a queue.

Actions.Name: Complete the message in a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation completes a message in a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Create a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation creates a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Dead-letter the message in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation moves the message to the Dead-Letter Queue.

Actions.Name: Dead-letter the message in a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation moves the message to the topic Dead-Letter Queue.

Actions.Name: Defer the message in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation defers a message in a queue.

Actions.Name: Defer the message in a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation defers a message in a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Delete a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation deletes a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Get deferred message from a queue
Actions.Description: The operation gets a deferred message from a queue.

Actions.Name: Get deferred message from a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation gets a deferred message from a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: When a message is received in a queue (auto-complete)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a message is received in a queue and auto completes the message.

Actions.Name: When a message is received in a topic subscription (auto-complete)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a message is received in a topic subscription and auto completes the message.

Actions.Name: When one or more messages arrive in a queue (auto-complete)
Actions.Description: The operation receives one or more messages from a queue. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

Actions.Name: Get messages from a queue (peek-lock)
Actions.Description: The operation receives messages from a queue with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

Actions.Name: When one or more messages arrive in a topic (auto-complete)
Actions.Description: The operation receives one or more messages from a topic. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

Actions.Name: Get messages from a topic subscription (peek-lock)
Actions.Description: The operation receives messages from a topic subscription with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

Actions.Name: When a message is received in a queue (peek-lock)
Actions.Description: The operation triggers a flow when a message received in a queue with peek-lock mode.

Actions.Name: When a message is received in a topic subscription (peek-lock)
Actions.Description: The operation triggers a flow when a message received in a topic subscription with peek-lock mode.

Actions.Name: When one or more messages arrive in a queue (peek-lock)
Actions.Description: The operation receives one or more messages from a queue with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

Actions.Name: When one or more messages arrive in a topic (peek-lock)
Actions.Description: The operation receives one or more messages from a topic with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

Actions.Name: Renew lock on the message in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation renews lock on a message in a queue.

Actions.Name: Renew lock on the message in a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation renews lock on a message in a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Renew lock on the session in a queue
Actions.Description: The operation renews a session in a queue.

Actions.Name: Renew lock on the session in a topic subscription
Actions.Description: The operation renews a session in a topic subscription.

Actions.Name: Send message
Actions.Description: This operation sends a message to a queue or topic.

Actions.Name: Send one or more messages
Actions.Description: This operation sends one or more messages to a queue or topic.
